description:
The Microsoft HoloLens 2 is an augmented reality headset manufactured by Microsoft. It was released in November 2019, following an announcement in May 2019. It is the company's 2nd AR headset release.
- This headset is standalone and does not require a PC to use.
- This headset is heavy. 556 g
- This headset has a low refresh rate. 60 Hz
- This headset has a high horizontal field of view. 43Â°
- This headset does not require external base stations.
- This headset is sold without controllers.

faq.question: When was Microsoft HoloLens 2 released?
faq.answer: Microsoft HoloLens 2 was released on November 7th, 2019, following an announcement on May 2nd, 2019.

faq.question: How much does Microsoft HoloLens 2 cost?
faq.answer: The price for Microsoft HoloLens 2 is $3500. This does not include any controllers.

faq.question: What is the resolution of Microsoft HoloLens 2?
faq.answer: Microsoft HoloLens 2 has a resolution of 1440x936 per-eye, totalling approximately 1.35 million pixels per-eye, or 2.7 million pixels overall.

faq.question: What is the FoV of Microsoft HoloLens 2?
faq.answer: Microsoft HoloLens 2 has a horizontal field of view of 43 degrees. The vertical field of view of Microsoft HoloLens 2 is 29 degrees. Additionally, the headset has a diagonal field of view of 52 degrees.

faq.question: Does Microsoft HoloLens 2 have hand tracking?
Does Microsoft HoloLens 2 have eye tracking?
